item.title: Michigan Law Would Let You Register To Vote Unless You Prove You’re Not A Citizen
item.description: 'Michigan elections are already [in] shambles. Now, HB 4983 will turn our elections into the wild west,' said state Rep. Rachelle Smit.

item.title: 50 Years After Vietnam, Our Troops Remain Demoralized By Defeat
item.description: We would do well to consider how our choices in Vietnam affected our military and society in ways still felt today.

item.title: Decline Of Christianity Sparks Rise In Claims For Religious Protections Of Psychedelics
item.description: Well-funded and led by scholars, lawyers, religious leaders, and entrepreneurs, the goal is to obtain U.S. legalization of psychedelics.

item.title: Poll: Democrats’ Empathy Schtick Isn’t Fooling Voters Anymore
item.description: For the first time in 30 years, Democrats and Republicans are tied 33 percent to 33 percent on the question of who 'cares more for the needs of people...

item.title: Reading Scores Plummet In Rich Blue States And Rise In Poor Red Ones
item.description: The reading and math scores of students in Mississippi and Louisiana have surpassed those in deeply Democratic states such as California.
